argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iblsplitf.X | |- F/ x ph |
| 2 |  | iblsplitf.vol | |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` ( A i^i B ) ) = 0 ) |
| 3 |  | iblsplitf.u | |- ( ph -> U = ( A u. B ) ) |
| 4 |  | iblsplitf.c | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. U ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | iblsplitf.a | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. L^1 ) |
| 6 |  | iblsplitf.b | |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> C ) e. L^1 ) |
| 7 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ y C |
| 8 |  | #P_nfcsb1v | |- F/_ x [_ y / x ]_ C |
| 9 |  | #P_csbeq1a | |- ( x = y -> C = [_ y / x ]_ C ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_cbvmpt | |- ( x e. U |-> C ) = ( y e. U |-> [_ y / x ]_ C ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ y e. U ) -> y e. U ) |
| 12 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ x y e. U |
| 13 | 1, 12 | #P_nfan | |- F/ x ( ph /\ y e. U ) |
| 14 | 4 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( ph /\ y e. U ) /\ x e. U ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_ex | |- ( ( ph /\ y e. U ) -> ( x e. U -> C e. CC ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_ralrimi | |- ( ( ph /\ y e. U ) -> A. x e. U C e. CC ) |
| 17 |  | #P_rspcsbela | |- ( ( y e. U /\ A. x e. U C e. CC ) -> [_ y / x ]_ C e. CC ) |
| 18 | 11, 16, 17 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ph /\ y e. U ) -> [_ y / x ]_ C e. CC ) |
| 19 | 9 | #P_equcoms | |- ( y = x -> C = [_ y / x ]_ C ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( y = x -> [_ y / x ]_ C = C ) |
| 21 | 8, 7, 20 | #P_cbvmpt | |- ( y e. A |-> [_ y / x ]_ C ) = ( x e. A |-> C ) |
| 22 | 21, 5 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ph -> ( y e. A |-> [_ y / x ]_ C ) e. L^1 ) |
| 23 | 8, 7, 20 | #P_cbvmpt | |- ( y e. B |-> [_ y / x ]_ C ) = ( x e. B |-> C ) |
| 24 | 23, 6 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ph -> ( y e. B |-> [_ y / x ]_ C ) e. L^1 ) |
| 25 | 2, 3, 18, 22, 24 | #P_iblsplit | |- ( ph -> ( y e. U |-> [_ y / x ]_ C ) e. L^1 ) |
| 26 | 10, 25 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ph -> ( x e. U |-> C ) e. L^1 ) |
